text: Shesh i Bardhë (lit. "white field")Shesh i Bardhë Cobo Winery is an Albanian wine variety. It is recommended served slightly chilled at about 50 degrees Fahrenheit.Gregory Alonzo: Albanian Wines, The Missing Tradition EVE BUSHMAN, NOVEMBER 1, 2012 ==References== Category:Albanian wine
title: Shesh i Bardhë
